config.description: Configure the basic parameter of TCP6

synwait-time.description: Wait time for establishing a TCP6 connection

finwait-time.description: Wait time for closing a TCP6 connection

queue-max.description: Set maximum queue of outgoing TCP6 packets

send-rst.description: Set TCP6 RST packet sending without listening port nummber

clear.description: Closed a TCP6 connection or clear the statistics of all TCP6 connections

tcbs.description: Closed a TCP6 connetion based on the index of tcb

tcb.description: Closed a TCP6 connetion based on the index of tcb

clear-connect-address.description: Closed a TCP6 connection based on ip address and port

clear-connect-vrf.description: Closed a TCP6 connection based on ip address,port and vrf

config_schema.description: Configure the basic parameter of TCP6

synwait-time.description: Wait time for establishing a TCP6 connection

finwait-time.description: Wait time for closing a TCP6 connection

queue-max.description: Set maximum queue of outgoing TCP6 packets

send-rst.description: Set TCP6 RST packet sending without listening port nummber

brief.description: Show brief information of TCP6 connections

tcb.description: Show the detail information of all TCP6 connections or a specific TCP6 connection

snduna.description: Sequence number of sent and not acked

sndnxt.description: Sequence number for sending new data

tooshort-errs.description: Error segments of too short length

outof-order-segs.description: Received segments that out of order

outof-order-seg-len.description: Received segment length that out of order

toobig-errs.description: Received segments that out of received window

toobig-err-len.description: Received segment length that out of received window

ackunsent-errs.description: Received ack that not send data

part-dup-packs.description: Receive the num of packets with some duplicate data

rtxmctr-segs.description: Number of control segments that being retransmitted

outdata-seg-len.description: Total length of sent data segments

ackonly-segs.description: Number of sent ack segments only

wndprobe-out-segs.description: Number of sent window probe segments

wndupdate-out-segs.description: Number of sent window update segments

connclose-inrxmts.description: Number of closed connections that being retransmitted

keepalive-tmos.description: Number of keepalive segments that being out of interval of keepalive timer

connclose-in-keepalive.description: Number of closed connections because of not receiving keepalive segments

sndnxt.description: Sequence number for sending new data
